security_requirements: Data encryption (in transit and at rest)
Traffic control using security groups and network ACLs
scope: Web application infrastructure and data flow including user interactions and backend processes
assumptions: The system is scalable to handle varying user loads
AWS services are properly configured for security
Monitoring and alerting is in place for security incidents
constraints: Dependence on AWS for infrastructure services
Potential latency issues with third-party integrations
Regulatory compliance impacts on data handling
